title: Picture Story: Why should I(we) be punished, and where to report these two?
body:
Yea, I know...I'm a rotten player that deserves punishment for dodging the queue.....To avoid losing LP by playing with not one, but two trolls...
Right RIOT?
You pretty much make it so i HAVE to play with these types..I mean, unless I want to get punished for NOT wanting to play with trolls and all.

Is it even worth my while to hope that is i send these pics in to RIOT via e-mail that they will punish these two, while ofc chastising me for dodging or should I just not even bother?
I seriously doubt RIOT even cares anymore. By what I have seen, which is absolutely nothing, they encourage trolling by not doing anything about it...Well, and making ME out to be the bad guy...

I shoulda just went on and FF@20 here...I mean, by the amount of trolls i am getting in games I'm gonna lose LP no matter what anyways...

replies.body: That's some shit, not gonna lie. But damn, half an hour for dodging? Didn't that used to be, like, 15 minutes?

This was #2, 1st one was 5 minutes...
I got the troll with the "short" name in the queue before (He was saying how he was going to screw everyone over then - that's why I SS this queue)...
How in hell he ended up in my queue again right after is a goddam cursed miracle.
Am I really THAT unlucky?
2 queues, same troll...5 min apart...

But yea...You all can't blame me for getting out of that garbage, right?
:/
I'm put with 4 man premades every game who are EXTREMELY toxic. Solo Q is coming back though

Ah ok...A couple replies here I feel kinda silly for not knowing wtf?

ED: Gak, now I see the thread/reply layout...Derp OOPS.
:P

Yeah I have had multiple junglers today who just flat out "Trolled" my lane when I was doing good in multiple games at start of lane phase they run in without using their brains and get the enemy fed, I even asked a couple of times without insults " What was the plan" and they are like "I don't need to think before going in."

Like seriously Riot isn't enforcing a standard meta with the new champion select so get over yourself if someone wants to "Janna Mid" then they can Janna mid, and this used to be done in other seasons even by LCS before I believe.

The problem is that its uncommon and players threaten to report others, but really the junglers who troll issue needs to be addressed I play solo lanes for a reason I don't need players blindly running in and getting the enemy fed.

Heck I just locked caitlyn mid because I got matched with another troll jungle, and Support who would be useless to prove a point, can't wait till everyone feeds this game and its likely lost we'll find out :3.

A Janna mid I would be ok with...The dude that pick her was definitely going to troll tho, along with the blitz top.

> " What was the plan" and they are like "I don't need to think before going in."
lol...
Still...That's just bad play, which I only wish I had...Hell, bad players try at least...

http://i.snag.gy/PRe2L.jpg

All those troll feeders keeping you down?
And this is why team builder is better. You could kick people. I get they can't do that for ranked play, but this is absurd.

how long tell it resets?
form 15mins to 5mins?
Have you tried a support ticket?  If not, I wouldn't be blaming the company for this.

Riot doesn't enforce the meta. You can play Soraka top lane if you want and it won't be a reportable offense or one that riot will awknowledge. 

However, the fact that they admitted they were going to troll is the part that they will focus on.

You chose to dodge.

No one forced you.

"I'm going to troll and ensure that we lose"
"YOU'RE THE BAD PERSON FOR DODGING"

smh

You missed the point so **FUCKING** hard, an antire plain of existance could fit inside the gap.

You don't have to be an ass for the sake of being an ass.
You couldn't pay me to play ranked right now with all the BS going on lol.
that is some shit. Rito needs to do something about this otherwise I'll be waiting til solo q comes back.. at least then it wont be teams of trolls like it is currently.
